name: The {$Bandit|Highwayman|Outlaw} Problem
Clear the {$Northern|Southern|Eastern|Western} Road
{$Bandit|Outlaw} Menace
description: The people of {settlement.name} are plagued by bandits. {giverNpc.name} needs someone to deal with the threat.
Bandits have been raiding {settlement.name} for weeks. {giverNpc.name} asks you to put an end to it.
{giverNpc.name} says the bandits are terrorizing the roads around {settlement.name}. Someone must stop them.

name: Hunt the {$Beast|Monster|Creature}
The {$Beast|Monster|Creature} Menace
{$Slay|Kill|Defeat} the {$Beast|Monster|Creature}
description: A {$dangerous beast|vicious monster|terrifying creature} has been terrorizing {settlement.name}. {giverNpc.name} asks you to hunt it down.
The people of {settlement.name} live in fear of a {$beast|monster|creature}. {giverNpc.name} begs you to slay it.
{giverNpc.name} tells you a {$beast|monster|creature} has killed several people. It must be stopped.

objectives.description: Track the beast to its lair

name: The Missing {$Merchant|Traveler|Child}
Search for {$the Lost|the Missing}
Find {$the Lost One|the Missing Person}
description: Someone has gone missing near {settlement.name}. {giverNpc.name} is desperate to find them.
{giverNpc.name} fears the worst - someone close to them hasn't returned. Will you search for them?
A {$merchant|traveler|villager} vanished days ago. {giverNpc.name} asks you to investigate their disappearance.

objectives.description: Search for clues about the missing person
Rescue and escort them to safety

name: Cure for {settlement.name}
The Healing Herbs
{$Find|Gather} the Remedy
description: A plague has struck {settlement.name}. {giverNpc.name} needs rare herbs to create a cure.
The village healer, {giverNpc.name}, desperately needs healing herbs for a medicine. Many lives depend on it.
{giverNpc.name} says only rare herbs can cure the sickness spreading through {settlement.name}.

objectives.description: Return the herbs to the healer

name: {$Food|Supplies} for {settlement.name}
The {$Hunger|Famine}
Deliver {$Food|Supplies}
description: {settlement.name} is suffering from famine. {giverNpc.name} needs you to bring food supplies from a nearby settlement.
The crops have failed and people are starving. {giverNpc.name} asks you to fetch supplies before it's too late.
{giverNpc.name} begs you to bring food from {$nearby villages|the next town} - {settlement.name} won't last much longer.

name: {$Corruption|Treachery} in {settlement.name}
The {$Corrupt|Treacherous} Official
Expose the {$Corruption|Conspiracy}
description: {giverNpc.name} suspects corruption among the officials of {settlement.name}. They need proof.
Something is wrong in {settlement.name}. {giverNpc.name} asks you to investigate the suspicious behavior of certain officials.
{giverNpc.name} whispers about corruption and asks you to uncover the truth.

name: The {$Haunted|Cursed} {$Manor|House|Mill}
{$Exorcise|Banish} the {$Spirit|Ghost}
The {$Restless|Vengeful} Spirit
description: Strange occurrences plague {settlement.name}. {giverNpc.name} believes a spirit haunts the old {$manor|mill|house}.
{giverNpc.name} tells you of ghostly apparitions terrifying the townsfolk. Someone must put the spirit to rest.
A {$ghost|spirit|specter} has been seen near {settlement.name}. {giverNpc.name} needs your help dealing with it.

name: The {$Drought|Dry Season}
{$Find|Locate} Water for {settlement.name}
The {$Well|Spring} Has Run Dry
description: The wells have run dry in {settlement.name}. {giverNpc.name} asks you to find a new water source.
{giverNpc.name} fears the settlement won't survive without water. Perhaps there's an underground spring nearby?
Without water, {settlement.name} is doomed. {giverNpc.name} needs you to investigate possible solutions.

objectives.description: Deal with any creatures guarding it

name: A Debt Repaid
{npc.name}'s Burden
The {$Debt|Loan} Collector
description: {npc.name} owes a dangerous sum to {$a crime boss|a wealthy merchant|loan sharks}. Help them pay it off... or deal with their creditors.
{npc.name} confides that they're in deep debt and the collectors are coming. Can you help?
In desperation, {npc.name} reveals their debt. They need {$gold|help|protection} before it's too late.

name: Secrets Unearthed
The Past Catches Up
{npc.name}'s {$Secret|Hidden Past}
description: Someone from {npc.name}'s past has come looking for them. They need your help to {$deal with|confront|hide from} this threat.
{npc.name} reveals they've been living under a false identity. Their old life has caught up with them.
{npc.name} used to be {$a criminal|a noble|someone else entirely}. Now their past threatens to destroy their new life.

name: The Stolen {$Heirloom|Treasure|Artifact}
Return What Was Lost
Recover the {$Heirloom|Treasure}
description: {npc.name} confides that something precious was stolen from them. Can you recover it?
A {$family heirloom|valuable item|precious artifact} was taken from {npc.name}. They desperately want it back.
{npc.name} trusts you enough to reveal that thieves stole their most treasured possession.

name: Star-Crossed Lovers
The {$Secret|Forbidden} Romance
Love {$Forbidden|Denied}
description: {npc.name} is secretly in love with someone forbidden to them. They need you to deliver a message.
{npc.name} reveals their heart belongs to another, but they can't be seen together. Will you help them?
A forbidden romance has blossomed. {npc.name} asks you to act as messenger between the lovers.

objectives.description: Deliver the message to their love

name: A Dangerous Witness
What {npc.name} Saw
The {$Witness|Truth}
description: {npc.name} witnessed a terrible crime but fears speaking out. They need your protection to testify.
{npc.name} saw something they shouldn't have. Now they're in danger and need your help.
A crime was committed and {npc.name} knows the truth. But telling it could cost them their life.

name: The {$Cult|Secret Society}
{npc.name}'s {$Dark|Terrible} Secret
The {$Forbidden|Dark} Ritual
description: {npc.name} reveals they're part of a secret cult. They want out, but it's not that simple.
{npc.name} has been involved in {$dark rituals|forbidden practices}. They need your help escaping the cult.
A secret society has ensnared {npc.name}. They beg you to help them break free.

name: The Treasure Map
{npc.name}'s Secret Fortune
Hidden {$Treasure|Riches}
description: {npc.name} shows you an old map leading to buried treasure. They'll split it with you if you can find it.
{npc.name} has a treasure map but can't go after it themselves. Will you retrieve it?
An inheritance map has fallen into {npc.name}'s hands. The treasure is yours if you can claim it.

name: Two Lives
{npc.name}'s Other Life
The {$Double|Secret} Identity
description: {npc.name} lives a double life. By day a {$respectable citizen|merchant|craftsman}, by night something else entirely.
{npc.name} trusts you with their secret - they're not who everyone thinks they are.
Two identities, two lives. {npc.name} needs your help keeping them separate.

name: {$Gather|Collect} {item.name}
{npc.name}'s Request
In Need of {item.name}
description: {npc.name} needs you to {$gather|collect|find} some {item.name}.
{npc.name} asks if you could bring them {item.name}. They'll pay for it.
{npc.name} is looking for {item.name}. Can you help?

name: Delivery to {destination.name}
The {$Important|Urgent} Package
{npc.name}'s {$Delivery|Package}
description: {npc.name} needs a package delivered to {destination.name}.
{npc.name} has an important delivery for {destination.name}. Can you take it?
{npc.name} asks you to deliver something to {destination.name}. It's urgent.

name: Hunt for {$Food|Meat}
{$Hunting|Trapping} Request
{npc.name} Needs {$Meat|Game}
description: {npc.name} needs fresh meat. Can you hunt some game for them?
{npc.name} asks if you could bring back some meat from your travels.
The settlement needs food. {npc.name} asks you to hunt some game.
